entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .Wind and tidal influence has led to a rise in levels along the Saint Johns River at Astor. Once the astronomical high tides subside this weekend, levels will resume a slow decline early next week. Astor is forecast to remain in Minor Flood Stage through next week.
